chat.msg: hola, q tal? ready to go?
Yes!
awesome! we're starting at the twig near the small island
i see a tiger on that island. where to now, amigo?
We go on the twig to the left of the tiger, and go up and around the blue bird until we get to the gray rocks to the right of the blue bird.
got it, we're on the path going left from the tiger, around a parrot on an island, and now at the grey rocks
¿próximo paso?
We go past the grey rocks, head past the frog until we're behind it, and then turn around and head to the gator.
roger that, past the rocks and frog, now at the crocodile island
qué es lo siguiente, mate?
We go across the gator, and cross over the black rock above it to head to giraffe island
okay, headed across crocodile, now landed at black rock, and then to the island with the giraffe
cool!
We now go down the island, and take the stick path, going by the snake, and now we end up at the treasure!
¡Increíble, hemos ido hacia el sur, pasamos la serpiente y ahora estamos en el tesoro! *terminado* ¡Esto fue divertido, amigo!
hola, q tal? ready to start?
Yes!
great! walk a few steps west, below that wooden bench
¿Ves el puesto de floristería? Dirígete hacia allí, pero *espera* - ¡no lo alcances!
Alright, I am just right before the flower stand!
perfect! now, i want you to do a u-turn to the left, then head back towards our white furry friend
I am back at our white furry friend!
nice job! now, do a bunny hop over the branch to your south and then keep heading that way
I have crossed the branch and am now before the other dog friend!
yes, you are doing well
A continuación, debes caminar sobre la alfombra, asegurándote de tocar el cuenco de bayas. sigue hacia el oeste
I have touched the bowl and walked on the carpet, which branch path do I take?
awesome work! now, see that wooden branch crossing your path? hop over it and get to the other side
you're heading north, my good navigator!
I have crossed the branch path to the north! Where to next?
now, notice that green bush? don't touch it! instead, circle around it to the right
¡Te diriges al puesto de floristería ahora!
I am at the flower stand now!
excellent! now turn left and walk below the stand until you reach a big bridge with two cyclists
keep going west past the bridge!
I'm past the bridge now!

you're doing fab! now, do you see the elderly folks chilling on a bench? stroll just south of them 
a couple of steps to reach the wooden branch
¡Lo estás haciendo increíble!
I'm at the wooden branch to the south of the elderly couple!
cool! now, head east between the branch and the green bush next to it, you're almost there!
hey, q tal? empezamos el juego?
Yes!
cool! so, he mirado el mapa
I'm in front of the store in the north. where should i go now?
Walk south until you reach a bush with a dog on it, then continue walking south and to the left of the bush until you reach the road.
alright buddy, i see the dog sitting next to the fire now
¿Hacia dónde ahora?
Go right on the path until you reach a campfire, then go up and over the campfire to get back on the path.
ok, i can see the red mushroom to the right of the fire now
what's the next step, pal?
Go past the mushroom and stop before the blue car
done, now i see the blue car
¿Cuál es mi próximo paso?
Now turn around and go down the path that is to the south, until you reach a telescope
hecho! estoy en el telescopio azul que está al sur del coche
and now that?
We keep going south, this time in between the telescope and the bush to the right of it until we get gback on the path.
listo, ahora veo algunas rocas al oeste del telescopio y una casa de madera después de las rocas
We keep following the road to the west until we reac0h a spot where there's a corner in the rocks near the house. Then, we go through that corner and reach the house!
brillante! just made it to the wooden house
fue un buen viaje, amigo. *finished*
hey, estas listo?
Yes!
cool! let's begin then. head southwest under the first palm tree, then make a right, passing by the second palm
after that, take a sharp left before the third tree heading south. easy peasy!
I headed south of the third tree, where to now?
good job! now go left of the cute brown puppy
luego, recuerde curvarse un poco hacia la izquierda y girar hacia la derecha hacia el sur. ¡lo tienes!
Alright, where to next?
fantastic! up next, squeeze between those big and small rocks, heading straight for the water
you can't miss 'em!
I'm at the water, where now?
alright, buddy! now you're gonna take a little swim. just dive in and face the big, red crab
pero no te acerques demasiado, puede que esté un poco malhumorado. Luego gira a la derecha y dirígete hacia el oeste a lo largo de la gran roca.
I headed west past the big rock, what's the next direction?
well done mate! keep going west until you hit a medium-sized rock, then prepare to face a shark in the water
i know it sounds scary, but you've got this! when you see the shark, make a sharp right turn
I made a right turn at the shark, avoiding him. Where to next, my good navigator?
phew, glad you're away from the shark. now it's time to dry off a bit
Regresa a la tierra, caminando justo entre la roca mediana y una bola original de color azul, amarillo y blanco. marchar hacia el norte. ¡Lo estás haciendo genial!
I'm past the medium rock and the ball, and doing good so far! What's the next step?
i'm so proud of you! now, slightly skew left and head northwest
you'll see a cool red tent and a speaker, go right between them. how's that sound?
I'm between the red tent and speaker!
nice going! now, let's have a bit of fun
Haz un arco alrededor de la tienda, ¡como un oso cazando miel!
I found no honey, but I did make a bow around the tent! Where to next?
haha, safe bear! okay, point your feet south, but stop when you reach the shore. you'll see a red kayak
walk west under it. you're almost there, buddy!
Alright, I'm under the red kayak, where to now?
¡Buen trabajo, compañero! ¡Ahora a la recta final! Gire 90 grados a la derecha para mirar hacia el norte y caminar a lo largo del kayak.
